overview: A comic dream team takes on the stage version of Soldat Fabian Bom, the film classic who turns 70 in 2018.  Jojje JÃ¶nsson takes on the role of Nils Poppe's cult-declared figure, Fabian Bom, one of the most loving personalities of the century.  With his incredible sense of duty, exuberant mood and crazy antics, he takes the stage.
title: Private Fabian Bom
